text: Bhakalagananjeje lyubha lya imana, gubhaikengenenje bhandunji bhabhagwinji nnyumba jibhatamaga. Tandubhila lyamba mpaka ligulo a Pauli gubhaatalashiyenje ga Ukulungwa gwa a Nnungu, bhalilinga kwaatendanga bhakundanje ngani ja a Yeshu kwa talashiya shalia ja a Musha na ashinkulondola bha a Nnungu.
